sentences.sContent: Our office is above the hairdresser’s.
sentences.sCn: 我们的办公室在理发店上面。

sentences.sContent: He had a bruise just above his left eye.
sentences.sCn: 就在他左眼上方有块瘀伤。

sentences.sContent: I heard a strange noise coming from the room above.
sentences.sCn: 我听见楼上房间传来奇怪的响声。

sentences.sContent: The great bird hovered high above our heads.
sentences.sCn: 那只大鸟在我们头顶上方的高处盘旋。

phrases.pCn: 自高自大；趾高气扬；兴高采烈
变得自高自大；自视甚高

trans.tranOther: in a higher position than something else
